detailsData.title: Nationally Recognized Expertise
detailsData.content: Holley & Pearson-Farrer LLP is a boutique law firm nationally recognized for our expertise in public finance. Our mission is to provide expert legal advice to clients working to improve their communities with creative use of economic development finance tools.

detailsData.title: Innovative Counsel
detailsData.content: Since the firm was founded in 1993, our attorneys have provided forward-looking, innovative, clear, and practical counsel. We have been involved in more than $150 billion in complex public and corporate finance transactions.

detailsData.title: Certified MWBE and DBE
detailsData.content: Holley & Pearson-Farrer is a certified minority-and woman-owned (MWBE) and disadvantaged (DBE) firm. This certification underscores our commitment to diversity and inclusion in the legal profession.

detailsData.title: Award-Winning Service
detailsData.content: We were recently recognized for our role as disclosure counsel in The Bond Buyer’s 2023 Deal of the Year. This accolade highlights our dedication to excellence and client satisfaction.

address: 444 West Lake Street Suite 1700, Chicago, Illinois 60606
subHeading: Decades of Experience Shaping the Future
